p: Following the determination of the HI, an action plan to combat the adult vector of Ae. aegypti and Ae. albopictus was made. The plan involved scheduled treatments using an ultra-low volume electric insecticide nebulizer UVB Â® (Add Technologies, Brazil). Additionally, infested foci were treated with the larvicide Bti (Valent Bio Sciences Corp., USA), in order to eliminate the immature stages of the vector directly in the foci, as recommended by the Brazilian Ministry of Health.
